name: iionly/tidypics
description: Tidypics plugin provides a photo gallery with albums, tagging, and a slideshow.

suggest.coldtrick/widget_manager: With the Widget Manager plugin available the Tidypics plugin offers widgets for the index page (homepage) and group profile pages listing the latest albums and photos.
suggest.iionly/hammertime: The Hammertime plugin adds support for swipe touch gestures (left/right) to navigate in Elgg item lists (with pagination) and to load previous/next images in Tidypics full size image views.
suggest.iionly/elggx_fivestar: With the Elggx Fivestar plugin enabled the site members can rate albums and photos.
suggest.iionly/elggx_userpoints: With the Elggx Userpoints plugin enabled the site members gain userpoints on creating albums and uploading photos.
